adrFormatAddress: 333 E 38th St, New York, NY 10016-2772, USA

originalText.text: Amazing staff (ultrasound technicians are really kind and understanding). I am putting this review after seeing other reviews here that says Dr. Adler does not even do the procedures but makes others do it. However, I requested that he reviews my ultrasound images without probing me (personal and religious reasons) since there were two good female technicians who were doing it anyway but he refused outrightly and said he wouldn't review anything unless I allowed him to come and do the scan on me himself and it sounds creepy to me. Thanks a lot for making me wait months now for another appt.

text.text: Amazing staff (ultrasound technicians are really kind and understanding). However, I requested that he reviews my ultrasound images without probing me (personal and religious reasons) since there were two good female technicians who were doing it anyway but he refused outrightly and said he wouldn't review anything unless I allowed him to come and do the scan on me himself and it sounds creepy to me. originalText.text: I was recommended to Dr Adler for a cortisone shot. He did not do the procedure but allowed a fellow to do it. He was in the room but never talked to me or ask my permission to have a different doctor do the procedure. I did not make an appointment with him to have another doctor experiment and learn on me. DO NOT MAKE AN APPOINTMENT WITH HIM.

originalText.text:
I was referred to Dr. Adler for an ultrasound guided cortisone injection.
I was quoted $7200 for the procedure.
Outrageously expensive.

originalText.text: Dr. Adler was kind, caring and competent. The facility and the staff is amazing!

originalText.text: The best ever. I've been to him several times.
